name: Red Night
storyline:
Year 1987-88. The beginning of Perestroika has stirred Soviet society. People in the city of M start listening to rock music and actively express their opinions on various topics. The Perestroika wave even reaches closed cities, and in the city of M, unrest begins—how will future events impact the classified research at the local scientific research institute?

Three characters experience their own unique perspectives against the backdrop of an unclear cataclysm in the atmosphere of the late USSR. Each hero has their own view of the situation, trapped within a room or building where they happened to be when the events began. The player will solve various tasks and puzzles, hide, and unravel the “Red Night” incident.
summary: A 2.5D game immersing you in the atmosphere of Soviet perestroika. A grim mystery awaits in the city of M, where a terrifying incident has occurred. You’ll explore locations, solve puzzles, and uncover secrets hidden in the shadows of events that shook this world.
